name: Kungfu Poker: Texas Hold'em
description:
Play free Texas Hold’em Poker at Kungfu Poker app. Show off your poker skills and become a poker master!

“Kungfu” originally means skill achieved through hard work and practice. Beat other players with your “poker Kungfu” now!

Kungfu Poker Features:
- POKER TOURNAMENTS
Participate in tournaments around the world. Challenge other players and get your rings!
- DAILY SIGN-IN BONUS
Get your daily bonus by signing in every day!
- LUCKY DRAW
Spin the wheel and receive free poker chips!
- DAILY CHALLENGES
Complete your daily challenges to win bonus chips!
- FAIR GAME GUARANTEED
All games use a Random Number Generator (RNG). We guarantee the best and fairest gaming experience for all players.

Kungfu Poker is for amusement only. The game does not offer “real money gambling” or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social poker gaming does not imply future success at “real money poker”.

Follow our social media accounts.Be the first to know about our promotions and get a chance to win free chips!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KungfuPokerApp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kungfu_poker/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KungfuPoker
